thread.title: Picking stocks is fun but spreading risk is safe
thread.title_full: Picking stocks is fun but spreading risk is safe | afr.com

author: Jeremy Chunn
title: Picking stocks is fun but spreading risk is safe
text: by Jeremy Chunn To illustrate the power of diversification ETF provider Vanguard assembled 1000 portfolios that roughly mirror SMSF allocations and compared them with versions where half is invested in global and local index funds. The ribbon shows the rolling two-year variance of returns for 90 per cent of portfolios and shows SMSFs are riskier than balanced or growth funds, but most of it is self-imposed.
